lcap-h5-tk-sfriends/value.description: The value that needs to be passed in

lcap-h5-tk-sfriends/secret.description: Secret key, letters or numbers, please leave it blank if not used

lcap-h5-tk-sfriends/shareUrl.description: Share address (default is current page address)

lcap-h5-tk-sfriends/shareTitle.description: FB title (default is the current page title)

lcap-h5-tk-sfriends/shareBitmap.description: The URL of the shared image (too large or inaccessible will cause failure)
